markdownRemark.excerpt: When you want to separate servers and members from another workspace. E.g. your hobby projects may be in your personal workspace while the company you work with…
markdownRemark.html: When you want to separate servers and members from another workspace. E.g. your hobby projects may be in your personal workspace while the company you work with may use branded workspaces with the company name.

frontmatter.title: Why does it say “Must be owner or admin”?
